NewsArticle.Title: Warrior Training Grounds Grand Opening
NewsArticle.Content:
"After Deochs of construction and large amounts of donations, the Warrior Training Grounds are now open! There are new skills for the true warrior to learn. Large facilities for warriors to focus and measure their skills. We also have a blacksmith selling weapons and shields. So come down to Tagor, the Training Grounds are in the large building in the South-East end of the town. Memberships are now available."
Scribe Training Grounds Hostess
